entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:32 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:29 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:29 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
